nodes.text: Darg-3 was a hyperspace jump point, marked by a navigation buoy, in deep space. The Imperial Dreadnaught-class prison ship Dargon was attempting to reach this jump point when it was attacked by Rebel forces making a bid to disable and capture the vessel. The Dargon is believed to have eventually reached Darg-3, although whether it was under Rebel or Imperial control at the time is uncertain.
